traits.name: Headfirst Charge
entries: The giff can try to knock a creature over; if the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line that ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of muskets and pistols.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giff makes two pistol attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Musket
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Pistol
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fragmentation Grenade (1/Day)
entries: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of the grenade's detonation must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6 damage) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
